name: Pico de Gallo
description: This quick, easy recipe comes from Roy Choi, the Los Angeles chef behind the Kogi food trucks. Here, a heaping tablespoon of Chinese chili bean sauce (toban djan) or Korean chili bean paste (gochujang) adds a twist on a traditional pico de gallo. Serve alongside a carne asada taco, or pair with tortilla chips for a truly delicious weeknight meal.
keywords: cilantro, onion, tomato, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/2 red onion, peeled and chopped into small dice
1/2 bunch cilantro, leaves and stems, chopped roughly
3 scallions, white and green parts, sliced thinly
5 medium tomatoes, cored and chopped into small dice
1 heaping tablespoon Chinese chili bean sauce (toban djan) or Korean chili bean paste (gochujang)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large, nonreactive bowl, add all the ingredients and stir to combine. Adjust seasoning to taste. Serve with carne asada and grilled tortillas. Serve remainder with tortilla chips.
